name: FeedingTime (neverasaint)
description:
you are the owner of the famous dragon pig.
He doesn't like to eat anything but the biscuit his deathly allergic to.

Help him to get a balance Diet by luring it with the biscuit, but don't let him have it.

Drag and drop to biscuits
Get him to eat meat
And veggie

It's mobile friendly, oink!
